name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory SEAMON, Appellant

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Cecil B. Moore, I. W. Crippins, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
392 A.2d 685
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory SEAMON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1974.
Decided Sept. 22, 1978.
Cecil B. Moore, I. W. Crippins, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Arlen Specter, Dist. Atty., Richard A. Sprague, First Asst. Dist. Atty., David Richman, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., John H. Isom, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
